casebody.data:
JADE APPAREL, INC., a New Jersey Corporation, and Americoat Limited Corp., a New Jersey Corporation, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
UNITED ASSURANCE, INC., a New Jersey Corporation, Joseph Marino, Individually, Defendants,
and
Continental Indemnity Company, an Iowa Corporation, Applied Underwriters, Inc., a Nebraska Corporation, and Applied Underwriters Captive Risk Assurance Company, Inc., a British Virgin Islands Corporation, Defendants-Movants. M-878 September Term 2017
080668 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 23, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is denied.
